bibl.title: Some Comments on the Status of Imperial Freedmen (The Case of Ti. Claudius Aug. lib. Classicus).
bibl.note: A.E. 1972, 574 = I. Eph. 852 = S.E.G. XXX, 1980, 1308. See in part. pp. 274-279: 3. The Roman administration of Egypt and the function of Ti. Claudius Aug. lib. Classicus; - 4. Pflaum's group of "procuratores in Aegypto"; - 5. Other procuratores Alexandriae.
BRUUN Christer, Some Comments on the Status of Imperial Freedmen (The Case of Ti. Claudius Aug. lib. Classicus).
